alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 3:43AM CST until December 14 at 4:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 445 AM CST. * At 343 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of New Hope to near Garden City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bude, Kirby, Garden City, New Hope, Hamburg, Roxie and Meadville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
